    • Method Detail

      • getActionForInt

        public static String getActionForInt(int act)
        Gives the string corresponding to the integer action
        Parameters:
        act - The integer form of the action you are looking for
        Returns:
        The string form of the action for the integer given. Will return null if not an actual integer action

      • getIntForAction

        public static int getIntForAction(String action)
        Returns the numerical value corresponding to each action
        Parameters:
        action - The action you want the numerical value for
        Returns:
        The numerical value for the given action

      • getCharacterPath

        public static String getCharacterPath(int id,
                                      String action)
        Returns the path to the gif file given the id number and action
        Parameters:
        id - The id number of the revolutionary
        action - The action of the gif you desire
        Returns:
        The path to the gif file

        Scales a number to the width of the screen
        Parameters:
        num - The number being scaled
        Returns:
        The scaled version of the number
